Paper.Title: Biomedical Term Recognition With the Perceptron HMM Algorithm

Section.Paragraph: We propose a novel approach to the identi cation of biomedical terms in research publications using the Perceptron HMM algorithm. Each important term is identi ed and classi ed into a biomedical concept class. Our proposed system achieves a 68.6% F-measure based on 2,000 training Medline abstracts and 404 unseen testing Medline abstracts. The system achieves performance that is close to the state-of-the-art using only a small feature set. The Perceptron HMM algorithm provides an easy way to incorporate many potentially interdependent features.
